description: Detects creation of a new service. Author: Timur Zinniatullin, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate administrator or user creates a service for legitimate reasons.
name: New Service Creation
query: ((process.executable:*\\sc.exe AND process.command_line:*create* AND process.command_line:*binpath*) OR (process.executable:*\\powershell.exe AND process.command_line:*new\-service*))
